title: CCI clears Adani Power’s purchase of Lanco Amarkantak
description: Adani Power proposes to acquire a 100% stake and control of bankrupt Lanco Amarkantak following a corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP), the CCI said. Last month, Adani Power reportedly won the bid for the debt-laden firm for Rs 4,101 crore. “The proposed transaction does not result in an appreciable adverse effect on competition in any plausible relevant market in India. Accordingly, the definition of the relevant market may be left open,” the CCI said.
